name: WaxWolf vs The Killer Pianos
description:
A friend of mine (WaxWolf) started a gofundme to finalize and record a musical project dedicated to his father that recently passed away. I like his music so I decided to make a small game with him as a character.

Plase, consider checking out his music and his gofundme: https://www.gofundme.com/f/help-federico-waxwolf-record-a-prog-death-ep?utm_camp...

You can move using the arrow keys and shoot with the spacebar. The guitars will give you additional points and give allow faster shooting for a limited amount of time. The pianos will slowly get stronger!

There is a small video about the making of this game on my youtube channel:
